summary: A road movie about a dysfunctional family who embark on a Lewis and Clark re-enactment trek and discover themselves and each other in the process.
cast: Griffin Dunne|Madeleine Martin|Cara Buono|John C. McGinley|Stuart Margolin|Devon Graye|David Rasche|Becky Ann Baker|Ann Dowd|Dreama Walker|Scott Adsit|Marceline Hugot|Todd Susman|Hannah Dunne|Joseph Aniska|Ato Essandoh|Kristin Rose Garofalo|Ashley Hill|Harrison Holzer|Steve Kaufmann|Kirk Kelly|Cameron Munson|Tommy Nohilly|Ricky Roma|Greg Wood|Jasmine Brotzman|Nikki Vann
keywords: dysfunctional family|road movie|highway travel|f word|chicago illinois
title: The Discoverers
